content:
I'm getting a consistent 500 from the terminology server with the following error:

Access violation at address 0000000000CB71B9 in module 'FHIRServer.exe'. Read of address 0000000000000018

More details: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-security-label-ds4p/branches/master/qa-tx.html#l14

This is not happening after I changed the file but in case someone wants to reproduce this error, it was happening with this commit by the file input/resources/valueset/valueset-cui-mark.json:
https://github.com/HL7/fhir-security-label-ds4p/commit/4c486edf4923321dabef8d9e7efd1526f00c89d3#diff-993500b5a920c591c3948704d561afeb
